actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for coverage, under the insurance system established by title II of the Social Security Act, of service performed by employees of the Government Printing Office.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides for coerage, under the insurance system established by title II (Old-Age, Survivors' and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, of service performed by employees of the Government Printing Office.

titles.title: A bill to provide for coverage, under the insurance system established by title II of the Social Security Act, of service performed by employees of the Government Printing Office.
